data.eml:eml: Eight new species of the genus Clubiona Latreille, 1804 from Xishuangbanna Rainforest, southwestern China (Araneae, Clubionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yu, Hao, Li, Shuqiang (2019): Eight new species of the genus Clubiona Latreille, 1804 from Xishuangbanna Rainforest, southwestern China (Araneae, Clubionidae). Zootaxa 4545 (2): 151-178, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4545.2.1
